description: BbProcessingResource: Table storing broadband processing resource information for a specific area, cell, and time, including capacity limits and utilization.  Columns: dateTime (timestamp), Area_Name (geographic area), CellId (cell identifier), Id2 (alternate cell identifier), Id3 (unknown identifier), Id4 (unknown identifier), vsDataType (data type identifier), vsDataFormatVersion (data format version), BbProcessingResource.licPrbUnit (PRB unit license), BbProcessingResource.bbProcessingResourceId (resource ID), BbProcessingResource.dlBbCapacityNet (net downlink capacity), BbProcessingResource.licCapDistr (license capacity distribution), BbProcessingResource.dlBbCapacityMaxLimit (max downlink capacity limit), BbProcessingResource.ulBbCapacityMaxLimit (max uplink capacity limit), BbProcessingResource.ulBbCapacityNet (net uplink capacity).
queries: Show me the `dlBbCapacityNet` for CellId 1234 in Area_Name "Downtown" between 8 AM and 9 AM yesterday.
What is the maximum downlink capacity limit (`dlBbCapacityMaxLimit`) for all cells in Area_Name "Suburbia" at 12:00 PM today?
Retrieve all records where `vsDataFormatVersion` is 2.0 and `dlBbCapacityNet` is below 80% of `dlBbCapacityMaxLimit`.
Find the average `ulBbCapacityNet` for `Id2` = 5678 across all `Area_Name` values in the last 24 hours.
Give me a list of `BbProcessingResourceId` where `licPrbUnit` is greater than 100 and `Area_Name` is "Airport".
